long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your browsing experience with a live wallpaper that showcases the latest satellite image of our planet. This extension connects you to real-time satellite views of Earth, capturing stunning landscapes, cloud formations, and the play of light across continents. Each new tab presents a unique, awe-inspiring perspective that reflects the planet‚Äôs dynamic beauty, letting you feel connected to Earth‚Äôs vastness from your own screen.

This extension displays the latest image of our planet Earth as seen from the Himawari 8 Satellite every time you open a new tab. The satellite has been deployed by the Japan Meteorological Agency and takes photographs of Earth every 10 minutes. The extension also supports images from the GOES, DSCOVR, and Meteosat satellites.

The Earth Satellite View Live Wallpaper New Tab extension is ideal for space enthusiasts, geography fans, and anyone with a love for our planet. Whether you‚Äôre exploring the world or just looking to add a serene touch to your day, this live wallpaper delivers a fresh look at Earth with every tab you open.
